Verses: 1  Appozhudhu, Avar Padavil Eri, Ikkaraippattuth Thammudaiya Pattanaththirku Vandhaar.

2  Ange Padukkaiyile Kidantha Oru Thimirvaadhakkaaranai Avaridaththil Konduvandhaargal. Yesu Avargaludaiya Visuvaasaththaik Kandu, Thimirvaadhakkaaranai Nokki: Magane, Thidankol, Un Paavangal Unakku Mannikkappattadhu Endraar.
3 appozhudhu, Vedhapaaragaril Silar: Ivan Dhevadhooshanam Sollugiraan Endru Thangal Ullaththil Sollikkondaargal.
4 yesu Avargal Ninaivugalai Arindhu: Neengal Ungal Irudhayangalil Pollaadhavaigalai Sindhikkiradhenna?
5  Un Paavangal Mannikkappattadhu Endru Solvadho, Ezhundhu Nadavendru Solvadho Edhu Elidhu?

6 boomiyile Paavangalai Mannikka Manushakumaaranukku Adhigaaram Undenpadhai Neengal Ariyavendum Endru Solli, Thimirvaadhakkaaranai Nokki: Nee Ezhundhu Un Padukkaiyai Eduththukkondu, Un Veettukkup Po Endraar.
7 udane Avan Ezhundhu, Than Veettukkupponaan.
8 janangal Adhaikkandu Aachchariyappattu, Manusharukku Ippadippatta Adhikaaraththaik Koduththavaraagiya Dhevanai Magimaippaduththinaargal.
9 yesu Avvidam Vittup Purappattuppogaiyil, Aayaththuraiyil Utkaarndhirundha Maththeyu Ennum Oru Manushanaikkandu: Enakkup Pinsendruvaa Endraar; Avan Ezhundhu Avarukkup Pinsendraan.
10 pinbu Avar Veettile Pojanapandhiyirukkaiyil, Anega Aayakkaararum Paavigalum Vandhu, Yesuvodum Avar Seesharodungoodap Pandhiyirundhaargal.
11 pariseyar Adhaikkandu, Avarudaiya Seeshargalai Nokki: Ungal Podhagar Aayakkaararodum Paavigalodum Pojanam Pannugiradhennavendru Kettaargal.
12  Yesu Adhaikkettu: Piniyaalikalukku Vaiththiyan Vendiyadheyallaamal Sukamullavargalukku Vendiyadhillai.
13 paliyaiyalla, Irakkaththaiye Virumpugiren Enpadhin Karuththu Innadhendru Poik Katrukollungal; Needhimaangalaiyalla, Paavigalaiye Manandhirumpugiradharku Azhaikka Vandhen Endraar.
14 appozhudhu, Yovaanudaiya Seeshar Avaridaththil Vandhu: Naangalum Pariseyarum Anekandharam Ubavaasikkirome; Ummudaiya Seeshar Ubavaasiyaamalirukkiradhennavendru Kettaargal.
15  Adharku Yesu: Manavaalan Thangalodirukkaiyil Manavaalanudaiya Thozhar Thuyarappaduvaargalaa? Manavaalan Avargalai Vittu Edupadum Naatkal Varum, Appozhudhu Ubavaasippaargal.
16 oruvanum Kodiththundaip Pazhaiya Vasthiraththode Inaikkamaattaan Inaiththaal, Adhinode Inaiththa Thundu Vasthiraththaik Kizhikkum, Peeralum Adhigamaagum.

17 pudhu Thiraatcharasaththai Pazhandhuruththigalil Vaarththuvaikkiradhumillai; Vaarththuvaiththaal, Thuruththigal Kizhindhupom, Rasamum Sindhippom, Thuruththigalum Kettuppom; Pudhu Rasaththaip Pudhu Thuruththigalil Vaarththuvaippaargal; Appozhudhu Irandum Paththirappattirukkum Endraar.

18 avar Ivaigalai Avargalukku Sollikkondirukkaiyil, Thalaivan Oruvan Vandhu Avaraippanindhu: En Magal Ippozhudhudhaan Mariththupponaal; Aagilum, Neer Vandhu Avalmel Umadhu Kaiyai Vaiyum, Appozhudhu Pizhaippaal Endraan.
19 yesu Ezhundhu, Thammudaiya Seesharotungooda Avan Pinne Ponaar.
20 appozhudhu, Pannirandu Varushamaaip Perumpaadulla Sthiree:
21 naan Avarudaiya Vasthiraththaiyaagilum Thottaal Sosthamaaven Endru Than Ullaththil Ennikkondu, Avar Pinnaale Vandhu, Avarudaiya Vasthiraththin Oraththaith Thottaal.
22 yesu Thirumbi, Avalaip Paarththu: Magale, Thidan Kol, Un Visuvaasam Unnai Ratchiththadhu Endraar. Annerammudhal Andha Sthiree Sosthamaanaal.
23  Yesuvaanavar Thalaivanudaiya Veettile Vandhu, Thaarai Oodhugiravargalaiyum, Iraigira Janangalaiyum Kandu:
24 vilagungal, Indhach Sirupen Marikkavillai, Niththiraiyaayirukkiraal Endraar. Adharkaaga Avaraippaarththu Nagaiththaargal.
25  Janangal Veliye Thuraththappattapinbu, Avar Ulle Piravesiththu Andhach Sirupennin Kaiyaippidiththaar; Udane Aval Ezhundhirundhaal.
26 indhach Sangathi Athdhesamengum Pirasiththamaayitru.
27 yesu Avvidam Vittup Pogaiyil, Irandu Kurudar Avar Pinne Sendru: Dhaaveedhin Kumaarane, Engalukku Irangum Endru Kooppittaargal.

28 avar Veettirku Vandhapinbu, Andhak Kurudar Avaritaththil Vandhaargal. Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Idhai Seyya Enakku Vallamai Undendru Visuvaasikkireergalaa Endru Kettaar; Adharku Avargal: Aam Visuvaasikkirom, Aandavare! Endraargal.
29 appozhudhu, Avargaludaiya Kangalai Avar Thottu: Ungal Visuvaasaththinpadi Ungalukku Aagakkadavadhu Endraar.
30 udane Avarkaludaiya Kankal Thirakkappattadhu. Idhai Oruvarum Ariyaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal Endru Yesu Avargalukkuk Kandippaaik Kattalaiyittaar.
31 avargalo Purappattu, Aththesamengum Avarudaiya Keerththiyaip Pirasiththampanninaargal.
32 avargal Purappattup Pogaiyil, Pisaasupidiththa Oomaiyaana Oru Manushanai Avaridaththil Konduvandhaargal.
33 pisaasu Thuraththappattapinbu Oomaiyan Pesinaan. Janangal Aachchariyappattu: Isravelil Ippadi Orukkaalum Kaanappadavillai Endraargal.
34 pariseyaro: Ivan Pisaasugalin Thalaivanaale Pisaasugalaith Thuraththugiraan Endraargal.

35 pinbu, Yesu Sagala Pattanangalaiyum Giraamangalaiyum Sutri Nadandhu, Jeba Aalayangalil Ubadhesiththu, Raajyaththin Suviseshaththaip Pirasangiththu, Janangalukku Undaayirundha Sagala Viyaadhigalaiyum Sagala Noigalaiyum Neekki, Avargalai Sosthamaakkinaar.
36 avar, Thiralaana Janangalaik Kandapozhudhu, Avargal Meyppanillaadha Aadukalaippolath Thoindhuponavargalum Sidharadikkappattavargalumaai Irundhapadiyaal, Avargalmel Manadhurugi,
37 thammudaiya Seeshargalai Nokki: Aruppu Migudhi Velaiyaatkalo Konjam;
38 aadhalaal, Aruppukku Ejamaan (aruvadaiyin Ejamaan) Thamadhu Aruppukku Velaiyaatkalai Anuppumpadi Avarai Vendikkollungal Endraar.
